# mythicbeasts_vps_disk_sizes (Data Source)

Returns valid VPS disk size options for HDD and SSD-backed storage. Use these values when setting `disk_size` on `mythicbeasts_vps`.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_version = ">= 1.11.0"

  required_providers {
    mythicbeasts = {
      source = "paultibbetts/mythicbeasts"
    }
  }
}

data "mythicbeasts_vps_disk_sizes" "all" {}

output "all_disk_sizes" {
  value = data.mythicbeasts_vps_disk_sizes.all
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `hdd` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--hdd))
- `ssd` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ssd))

<a id="nestedatt--hdd"></a>
### Nested Schema for `hdd`

Read-Only:

- `size` (Number)


<a id="nestedatt--ssd"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ssd`

Read-Only:

- `size` (Number)
